text:
Hi Guys today I'm going to show you how to
open an oyster there are different kinds of

oysters but for all of them opening them is
basically the same so I'm going to show you

the safest way because you don't want to damage
your hands so what you need is an oyster knife

a cloth and some oysters so you have the flat
side on top the down side is hollow this is

the end of the oyster and this is the edge
so you take your oyster fold your cloth around

tipping your oyster knife an inch into the
oyster, give it a bit of power and you twist

your knife until it opens so while lifting
up your knife now you move your knife straight

under the closed side towards the end of the
oyster, take off the shell so the muscle meat

still sticks to the shell and you want to
have it loose you stick your oyster knife

under the oyster you cut it loose so this
is how you open an oyster good luck and enjoy!

and if you want to see more tips click on
the link below!
